summary: The Department of Homeland Security is required to submit a report to Congress each year on trends in immigration and naturalization, including how many people are unlawfully present in the United States. DHS’s report of December 2018 estimated 11.96 million foreign-born individuals were unlawfully residing here as of January 1, 2015. We reviewed DHS’s March 2019 report which listed 8 approaches that could improve its...
title: Department of Homeland Security: Review of Report on Agency Estimates of Foreign Nationals Unlawfully Residing in the U.S.
